refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the lxnm command.
lxnm is a program that attempts to manage the network connections. It is script-based and make networking configuration and setup as painless and automatic as possible.
lxnm is the default Network Manager for LXDE project. It currently only works with netstat plugin of lxpanel.
